ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Where to go
ygData.msgSnippet: I love porting. When I was in Kunark I bound myself at the mill and occassionally would self-port to EC to buy stuff from Freeport. I even made special trips
ygData.messageBody:
I love porting. When I was in Kunark I bound myself at the mill and
occassionally would self-port to EC to buy stuff from Freeport. I even made
special trips to pick stuff up for people.
Cool. What faction are the rock dervishes?
I have a lvl 29 DE wizard. I want to get her high enough to group port to
EC. Right now she can do Toxx, NK, and GFay. But EC would be much more
useful to port to. Finding groups is difficult for her. I want to find
something I can solo that won't kill my faction with my DE kin but won't
ruin any good faction i've earned with the good guys.
Any suggestions?
luv,
-Su

> When I was a level 14 druid someone on the list suggested Lavastorm.
> I was there until level 19. The loot is pretty good, cash anything
> from poor to fair, and the hunting interesting. Getting there was a
> special adventure for me, as I am KOS in Neriak. I went in chamo and
> levitated, turned left as I entered the forest, and kept to the zone
> wall. There is a river half way through the zone, which I levved
> across (not being a good swimmer) and kept on along the wall.
>
> I really liked the rock dervishes. Good cash and they dropped ore,
> which sells well but is heavy. I would pick up a load until I was
> encumbered even with strength, then port to a selling point. If you
> can find someone to port the stuff out at a discount, the ore would
> be profitable.
>
> I mostly solo, so that is what I did there. Lots of fun.
>
> Good hunting.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., Pedgar1787@a... wrote:
> >
> > Where to go to fight for a 15 Shaman? In Blackburrow now.
> > Also what wisdom items and armour should I have
> > Have some Lg.Ringmall and some ornate chain. Like the ornatechain
> weighs less.
> > Also have a lockjsw vest. Any help would be appreciated.
> >
> > Genila 15
> > Povar
> > Tammy
>
